attributes.action: Create a team of people in his government to be responsible for creating, maintaining and supporting play opportunities for children withing England, incluing Nurseries, Out of School Clubs and Youth Clubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A committee needs to be created to create, maintain and oversee play opportunities in England, I petition the Prime Minister to create this team within his government. 

This team of Playwork and Childcare professionals will be responsible for securing funding and safe guarding play opportunities in England.

Early Years is the recent years has demonstrated its lack of common sense and needs to be disbanded.

I would also ask that the people staffing this team have Vocational Qualifications, as practical Childcare and Playwork skills will help them more than a degree.
